Boston, MA 02210-2698 
January 3, 2019 
Request: Please review the enclosed information and retain for your 
records 
Thank you for opening additional accounts with us. 
As the final step in the account opening process, please review the Client Information and Account Information 
sections of this package and confirm that they are accurate; if changes are required, please call us at the number 
displayed above. 
The Client Relationship Agreement and other account documents we provided when you opened a previous 
account apply to your new accounts. Please refer to that information. Electronic versions are also available at 
www.ubs.com/accountdisclosures.
Once again, thank you for the opportunity to serve you. At UBS, we value your relationship with us, and we 
understand that we succeed only if you succeed. 
Sincerely, 
Scott Stackman I Lyle Casriel 
UBS Financial Services Inc. is a subsidiary of UBS AG
